<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="explode_level">explode_level</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="258" y="77"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_isinwaterrain_orbubblecolumn" inline="true"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps" collapsed="true"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="entity_is_underwater"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="explode"><field name="mode">TNT</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1.1</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:explode_level</field><comment pinned="true" h="139" w="371">	double explode_level = 0;
		explode_level = Math.pow(portions, 0.6);
		explode_level = Math.round(explode_level * 10.0) / 10.0;</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="itemstack_get_count"><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:SodiumIngot</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:SodiumIngot</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
